title: Foundation of Education: The Challenge of Professional Practices
author: Robert F. Mnergey & Joanne M. Herbert
description: This resource delves into the philosophical, social, and psychological foundations of education, highlighting the essential skills teachers need to excel in their profession.

title: Teacher Education
author: Promila Sharma
description: This book outlines essential teacher training concepts, strategies, and practices to enhance educators' professional growth and competence.

title: Action Research
author: Jonathan clave Prado & zarren Aleta Gaddi
description: This book outlines essential teacher training concepts, strategies, and practices to enhance educators' professional growth and competence.

title: Language Research: Principles and Application
author: Ofelia T. Posecion
description: This book covers the principles, methods, and applications of language research, serving as a valuable resource for aspiring language educators.

title: Reviewer Licensure Examination for Teachers (LET)
author: Arlun P. Cadiz
description: This reviewer is designed to help aspiring teachers prepare for the Licensure Examination for Teachers (LET), offering key concepts, sample questions, and test-taking strategies.
